para.emphasis: Additional option for Object Mapping in the JavaFX toolkit

listitem.para: There is a new key combination in object mapping mode. With that it is now possible to map the current component at mouse position and all its supported parents from the AUT's hierarchy.

para.emphasis: New actions for the SWT toolkit

listitem.para: You can now check the property of tree table items using the unbound module ub_trt_checkPropertyAtMousePosition from unbound_modules_swt.
The unbound modules ub_tbl_checkPropertyAtMousePosition and ub_tre_checkPropertyAtMousePosition from unbound_modules_concrete are now also implemented for the SWT toolkit.
